title: Add pixel modification support for index8 bitmaps
body:
This should be as simple as exposing `void SkBitmap::setPixels(void* p, SkColorTable* ctable)` for setting the pixel values, and adding index8 support to `sk_bitmap_get_pixel_colors `.

I don't believe that the SkBitmap class supports modification to a single pixel when the backing color type is index8.

PR adding support #196
